_errata_applied: E 2 US Artillery (Arty/1/9) weapon type changed from R to HvR (SM_Errata #2)
5th Va Cavalry morale corrected from B to C (SM_Errata #5)

_notes.weaponTypes: R=Rifle, M=Musket, SR=SharpshooterRifle, C=Cavalry carbine. The strengthPoints value IS the starting SP total (equals loss-chart boxes). The stragglerBoxes field (9) is the uniform straggler track for each regiment.
_notes.ammoClass: B=high-quality, C=standard, D=depot/reserve — affects shell/canister supply rates
_notes.wreckThreshold: Number of wrecked regiments at which brigade is considered wrecked (checkmark position on Brigade Loss Chart)

brigades.name: 4/1/1 (Gibbon)
brigades._note: Iron Brigade — random event 9 (Brigade of Iron) applies

corpsUnits.name: G 1 Maine
corpsUnits._note: Corps cavalry — cannot fulfill reserve for Fluke Stoppage (SM rule)

corpsUnits.name: 6 NY
corpsUnits._note: Corps cavalry — cannot fulfill reserve for Fluke Stoppage (SM rule)

corpsUnits.name: 3 Ohio
corpsUnits._note: Corps cavalry — cannot fulfill reserve for Fluke Stoppage (SM rule)

batteries.name: E 2 US
batteries._errata: Weapon type corrected from R to HvR (SM_Errata #2)

cavalryDivision.name: Cavalry Division
cavalryDivision._note: Pleasonton's artillery can replenish from any friendly ammo reserve (SM special rule)

independent._note: 5th Va Cavalry and Pelham units are Independent (exempt from command radius restrictions). Cannot enter hex with Union units or initiate Close Combat.

cavalry.name: 5th Va Cavalry
cavalry._errata: Morale corrected from B to C (SM_Errata #5)

artillery.name: Pelham A
artillery._note: Horse artillery — Limbered MA = 12. Can replenish from any friendly ammo reserve (SM special rule)

artillery.name: Pelham B
artillery._note: Can replenish from any friendly ammo reserve (SM special rule)

reserveArtillery._note: May trace command radius to any Confederate brigade leader/HQ or division HQ (8MP). Command radius can change without orders.

brigades.name: G/dH (Garland)
brigades._note: DETACHED at start to defend Fox's Gap

independentBrigades.name: Evans Brigade (Evans)
independentBrigades._note: Independent brigade — not subordinate to any division. Evans technically commands a division with Hood's brigades but command friction kept them separate (SM 3.3).
